job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform.
     * Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
     * Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
     * Be a productive member of the team.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Consultant NLP Engineer

* Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform.
     * Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
     * Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
     * Be a productive member of the team.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description is very high-level and lacks specific technical details about AI or ML tasks. It focuses on general platform improvement and product availability, which could apply to many engineering roles beyond specialized AI/ML profiles.

job_tasks.phrase: design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the creation and enhancement of software applications, which falls under the umbrella of software development.
Implementing technology solutions is a core aspect of software development, involving the integration and deployment of new tools and systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring the resiliency and availability of products is a key concern in operations engineering, focusing on system uptime and reliability.
Adhering to best practices and standards implies an understanding of established methodologies and quality requirements within a business or technical context.

soft_skills.phrase: Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions
Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products
Be a productive member of the team
